text:
Congress president Sonia Gandhi will address a rally in poll-bound Assam on March 30.

Party vice-president Rahul Gandhi will hold rallies in Karbi Anglong and other Upper Assam districts on March 29. He will also be addressing rallies on April 4 and 8.

In Assam, the first phase of polls will be held on April 4 for 65 seats. The scrutiny of nomination papers was held on March 19.

Assam has a total of one crore 98 lakh voters. The Election Commission has announced a two-phase voting for the 14th Assembly elections on April 4 and 11. Votes will be counted on May19.

The tenure of the Gogoi led-government comes to an end in June. — ANI
title: Sonia to address rally in Assam on March 30
